column4: quick question guys, just out of curiosity, I just got into Ubuntu7.10 and am wondering why some programs (for example synaptic) don't react to most gtk themes I install and have a dull grey look?
the apps ran as root. use the root users theme settings.
but *some* themes do apply to them (like the Human default theme, if I take another theme though, Synaptic becomes dull and grey)
could be they are gtk apps not totally gnome apps.
